name: Spaceguard 80
description: Shoot'em up adventures of a brave cat in galactic chaos. The intergalactic union is collapsing dragging the galaxy into chaos. No safe place anywhere anymore! The rescue team led by Spacecat receives a distress call.
minimum_requirements: OS: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 128 MB available space
